requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is required for local multiplayer
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is required for local multiplayer
